p: Kingdom: Plantae—Plants; subkingdom: Tracheobionta—vascular plants; superdivision: Spermatophyta—seed plants; division: Magnoliophyta—flowering plants; class: Magnoliopsida—dicotyledons; subclass: Asteridae; order: Lamiales; family: Lamiaceae—mint family; genus: Melissa L. —balm P; species: Melissa officinalis L.
